definitions.definition: Up the stairs; on or to a higher floor or level .
examples: I’ll take my shoes and put them away the next time I go upstairs .
I hate the people who live upstairs , and I especially hate their piano.
The woman upstairs told the people outside to stop reveling.
After Joe did a hula dance on the kitchen table, his friends wondered if he didn’t have a lot going on upstairs .

definitions.definition: In heaven , especially with regard to where a deity might be found.

main_definition: Up the stairs; on or to a higher floor or level .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) In the brain or mind .
( informal ) In heaven , especially with regard to where a deity might be found.
